content: > **note this shawl is being designed as we unwrap the house of a la mode > yarn advent this year together each > section is updated every couple of > days as a mini is opened this is a > free pattern still in process would > love to have you join along in the > fun updates will be made to your library regularly > > **if you d like to follow along for** > **vlogmas please join me here 1 ** **about let s shawl together** unwrap a new moment of joy with every mini let s shawl together is a joyful evolving pattern designed to grow alongside your yarn advent one stitch one shade one surprise at a time this shawl invites you into a rhythm of daily creativity and cozy anticipation designed to use 21 24 fingering weight minis 20g each this project is perfect for advent calendars scrap yarn stashes or your favorite curated collections you ll flow through playful stitch textures and row that feel as meditative as they are meaningful every section is crafted to let your colors shine while keeping the knitting approachable engaging and full of joy it s not just a shawl it s a shared journey a celebration of slowing down a keepsake stitched with memory movement and heart let s shawl together because every stitch feels better when we re making it together **yarn** designed for fingering weight yarn uses 1827 - 2088 yd/1680 - 1920 m pattern features house of a la mode fingering minis from advent 2025 each mini is 20 g 87 yards/80 m **suggested needles** us 5/3 75 mm straight or circular needles **finished measurements** tbd 1 https //www youtube com/@factorygirldesign
